summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear implemented in AppNav via opening the Google Form in a new tab and showing the exact thank-you toast. Footer pricing removal (REQ-4) appears addressed in DisclaimerBar. However, the diff summary indicates multiple additional, unrequested functional/UI changes across routing, auth/sign-in prompts, and feature behavior that go beyond the requested CTA/link/copy updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed route access control to make some routes public and others protected (beyond requested CTA/copy/link updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to rebuild/redesign existing features beyond UI copy/link updates and not to change authentication flows; altering which routes are public/protected is a functional change.

hallucinated_features.description: Removed or altered sign-in / email-related UI across multiple pages (e.g., Profile, Today's Brief) beyond replacing early-access/email-capture CTAs with a single Give Feedback CTA.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include not adding/changing authentication flows; broad removal of sign-in prompts/UI is a wider auth/UI change than requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx": sign-in UI removed; "frontend/src/pages/TodaysBriefPage.tsx": sign-in prompts/CTAs removed)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed Portfolio page behavior including logged-out sample preview, free-user local analysis limits, and 'Pro user persistence with backend snapshots'.
hallucinated_features.reason: This is a significant feature/behavior change unrelated to the requested feedback-mode CTA/link/copy changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx": new multi-mode behavior and Pro persistence/back-end snapshots)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified Alerts page to a simplified set of exactly three toggle rules with descriptions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; constitutes redesign/rebuild of existing feature behavior/UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/AlertsRulesPage.tsx": simplified Alerts page with exactly three rules)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified Library page states and Pro entitlement gating logic with upgrade CTA and null-safe handling changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; constitutes additional feature logic/UI changes beyond CTA/link/copy updates.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/LibraryHistoryPage.tsx": three states using Pro entitlement query and upgrade CTA)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified a route guard that redirects to profile if user email is not set and includes modal-based sign-in infrastructure (even if disabled).
hallucinated_features.reason: Touches authentication/identity flow behavior, which is explicitly a non-goal to add/change.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/layout/ProtectedPrototypeGate.tsx": redirect based on email presence; optional modal sign-in infrastructure)
